meanings.definition: Occurring or issued twice a month.
meanings.sent1: The semimonthly newsletter always arrives on the 1st and 15th of the month.
meanings.sent2: My semimonthly haircut appointment is on the second and fourth Fridays.
meanings.sent3: I look forward to the semimonthly pizza night with my friends.
meanings.sent4: The semimonthly staff meetings seem to come around faster each time.
meanings.sent5: The semimonthly garbage collection helps keep the neighborhood clean.

meanings.sent1: She receives her paycheck semimonthly, ensuring a steady income.
meanings.sent2: The rent is due semimonthly, making budgeting easier for us.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to shed semimonthly, leaving fur all over the house.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloom semimonthly, adding color to the garden regularly.
meanings.sent5: The bus schedule changes semimonthly, so I always check for updates.
